name: Important Links
author: Alex Demchak

sections.description: To make management of multiple marketing accounts, tools, and dashboards a bit easier – just add the links into your Important Links page. Any page that allows framing will be iframed in, all pages will have links to the site as well as the login/dashboard page if available.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the important-links folder to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.

  2. Activate the Important Links” plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.1.0

  • Allow Add and Remove with Ajax
  • Lazy Load iframes to increase performance
  • Change option to manage a single array instead of multiple options

1.0

  • Initial Concept

short_description: Easily keep track of important URLs inside your WordPress Dashboard
description: To make management of multiple marketing accounts, tools, and dashboards a bit easier – just add the links into your Important Links page. Any page that allows framing will be iframed in, all pages will have links to the site as well as the login/dashboard page if available.
